title: Great prices
text: Great prices, love the monthly automatice refill plan, high grade products, a little expensive but worth it.

title: Website was difficult to use and a bit…
text: Website was difficult to use and a bit clunky. Customer service was superb.

title: Good explanation of products,helping to…
text: Good explanation of products,helping to understand  the uses of various  supplements. Also, the proof is in the performance, and I've found LEH products  to be higher quality than others I have tried.

title: Love the Herbs
text: Love the Herbs, especially the tinctures, but really want a USPS tracking # for my orders within 24 hours or less.

title: The products seem to be working well! BUT...
text: The products seem to be working well!Just really need to include MORE Info about each product as I receive them in the mail they have no information as, 'when is the best time to take them, 'Can I take them together'? I get packets of all kinds but don't know what they are for! You don't seem to get it! Sending already printed brochures does not cover all possibilities!

title: I’m very happy with all of my purchases…
text: I’m very happy with all of my purchases at LEH. However this time I didn’t receive any shipping confirmation or tracking number. This would help immensely for people like me who often work away from home.

title: Lost empire herbs is legit
text: Lost empire herbs is legit, I love all of their products everything I purchased from them is always top quality and does what it says. After 5 years of using their products I still continue, lost empire herbs is A1

title: Excellent product quality. Slow/poor delivery time
text: Excellent product quality.Great product descriptions.Slow/poor deliveryProbably just USPS, but still.Amazon is your competition for delivery.If I could buy your products on Amazon I would.

title: Great products
text: Great products, I have tried several and have always been satisfied with the effects.  The staff is very helpful and replies promptly to questions.  I would like to see additional products, such as for men’s prostate health.  I trust Lost Empire formulas to do what they say.

title: The only difficult part of your process…
text: The only difficult part of your process was receiving my veteran’s discount.  I never could get it to work.  After receiving the code, a difficult process in it’s self there was no place to enter it on the order.  Just gave up.🙄

title: I started drinking it while being off…
text: I started drinking it while being off the pill for the first time and it helped a lot in making my body went back to a healthy hormonal balance. Last time I stopped the pill I got terrible side effects while my hormone were balancing, but this time I believe the powder helped my body be normal again in no time. The only bad thing is it taste really bad, even when i mix it with other things

title: Been a loyal customer hoping for more discounts or loyalty program
text: If there was some kind of loyalty coupons I’d give this place all the stars—- but someone who is trying not to spend $200/month on herbs, it’d be nice to be able to utilize old discount codes, etc. I’ve recommended you guys to all my friends and a refer a friend program would be nice too- idk. High quality goods are sold here, FOR SURE and the knowledge share is great but if I look on Amazon and other online retailers I can find “good enough” stuff that can replace some items. Hard for me to give 5 stars with the price not being subsidized with loyalty credits or some other kinds of fair incentives.

title: Mobile site a bit clunky.
text: I accessed your site using my phone, so it may have simply be because I was using a mobile device, but the moving back from the cart to continue shopping seemed to be a little clunky and not intuitive.  Again, this could be to me using a mobile device.  One other thing was that I order Tongkat-Ali, 60 capsules and it was 44.99, then, at checkout I was given the option to order more with the March Madness sale, and the second order was only 35.99.  That was a bit odd.With that said, I'm quite excited to receive my products as I have only heard great things from coworkers.

title: Shopping and checkout experience was…
text: Shopping and checkout experience was great.  However, at the very end of the purchase process (and I think this also happened during my last order as well), when I used PayPal button to process my payment (which worked OK) and then was redirected back to the Lost Empire Herbs site, my items were still in my cart and the purchase process seemed incomplete.   Note: This could be due to the Brave browser blocking some functionality.   To confirm my purchase actually did go through, I logged in (separately) to PayPal and saw my order charged there....and then I also logged into Lost Empire Herbs in a new browser tab/window and saw the order under my Orders history section.   Then after a few minutes I received the email from LEH pertaining to my order.  A fresh re-log-in to LEH site also finally showed my shopping cart as empty.

title: Great products... Fabulous Customer service Callie W is awesome.
text: everything about this company is on the up and up from my perspective.  Products are expensive and seem to work as advertised (only been a few weeks).  Problems shipping to Canada however.

title: The products are top quality
text: The products are top quality.  The quiz was helpful.  The bot is fun. The information on the website is unparalleled.  The only reason that I did not give it 5 stars is that the company is still very much targeted towards men:  There are no bundle deals for women.  There are many more articles specifically for men.  Some of the articles on herbs for men could also be useful for women. One that I read has a sentence at the very end saying that women can use it, too. However, I don't think many women will read it that far.    That being said, the article on women's hormone health was exceptional.

title: My shopping experience has been good…
text: My shopping experience has been good with Lost Empire Herbs. I did not communicate with their team on this most recent purchase, but I have in the past. No, I did not take their quiz, but I have before in the past. Their daily blog post I would have to say is the most influential reason behind my confidence and trust in their products. The wealth of knowledge I have gained from months of reading has been game changer. A company who is not just willing to sell you something, but educating customers long before they ever buy from you is something else entirely. Which makes me trust them! Folks you are in great hands with Lost Empire Herbs!

title: “Meaningful Impact”…
text: I have ordered products from Lost Empire and plan to rely on them for future shipments into the future. The products are first rate and I trust their knowledge and expertise when it comes to “quality and safe products “..  Their are many businesses on the web selling second tier products or worse, junk.  Thanks to Lost Empire for making an impact in such a meaningful way.

title: Cognitive Enhancement Package
text: I've been using the bundle for Cognitive Enhancement and my mind feels sharper than ever. There is a noticeable ease in forming thoughts and increased focus.

title: These are the most potent herbs I've purchased online!
text: I have purchased & taken many herbs online through Amazon, but Lost Empire Herbs have been the most potent herbs out of them all!  Pine Pollen, He Shou Wu, Mucuna, Tongkat Ali, and Nettle Root. I will continue to take these herbs because my husband and I have noticed we have more energy everyday and we seem to have a clearer thoughts...like not so foggy. Thank you Lost Empire Herbs!

title: quite satisfactory
text: My experience was quite satisfactory ..I do have a little trouble with your website, though, maybe it is just my browser. And so far your assistance has been very impressive, but I haven't received my last order, yet..

title: I was able to find and purchase some of…
text: I was able to find and purchase some of the products that I sought to purchase. You are doing a good job of describing the various herbs, what benefits they provide, and the customary dosages. The only problem I encountered was that you were out of a few herbal tinctures I wanted to purchase.  The tinctures are so convient for taking herbs when you don’t have very much time to do so. You were out of Cistanche, Horny Goat Weed, and Tribulus. I left my email so that I might be contacted whenever those items were in stock again.

title: Been on trt for 7 years I’m sick of it…
text: Been on trt for 7 years I’m sick of it tired of being a pin cushion. Searched for a natural real alternative, I found y’all. Haven’t had a t shot for seven weeks just been taking your product still messing with finding the right dosage but I feel good and my head is clear I’m very active still so I can say so far so good and my wife noticed so she ordered y’all’s Athena mix. If and when I have questions I’ll send them to y’all thanks for providing an alt to the trt. Kyle Dewitt

title: Shopping
text: Shopping for the products I wanted was easy as I already am a long time customer and knew what I wanted.Receiving my military discount was more challenging than I was prepared for but it is done.

title: Love the research
text: Love the research, the products are high quality, customer service is fantastic, shipping is fast, and the vast majority of the products I have used have made a difference. The ONLY issue, and it is a small one, sometimes when navigating the website it has been a bit challenging. Overall, I am very satisfied.

title: The buying experience is actually very…
text: The buying experience is actually very good. So far though the herbs that I’ve been using for the last few months have not given me any positive results except for the ashwaganda. It does seem to help with my sleep

title: I've been taking LE's Pine Pollen…
text: I've been taking LE's Pine Pollen capsules for a few years now and although there's been a big improvement over my former state of brain fog, I wonder of I could do better.

title: first time user

Also I was sent a coupon for 10% off which wasn't accepted. I won't be buying any more pop-up. Love the products I use them every day. Just wasn't happy with the results of my purchases. Thanks

I do a lot of my own tea mixtures and tinctures. I like the information on your web page. I may try other products. You company seem to be doing well and I alway get my orders quickly.

title: I am a 74-year-old woman
text: I am a 74-year-old woman. I bought Lost Empire Ashwaganda tincture to help with weakness and exhaustion that I'd been experiencing. I felt a difference within a week or so, felt more energy and strength. The original surge of energy did wane after that. But overall I do feel stronger. Thank you.

text: It's easy to mix and drink. I'm slowly increasing my mix until I feel comfortable. So far it's working like it should just making me feel better..

title: Good customer service
text: I appreciate all the helpful informational emails I've received since ordering pine pollen. I do want to mention that when ordering, I opted to get an extra pouch for 1 cent plus shipping so both my husband and myself could try it but when I went to place the order it only showed the 1 pouch. I didn't want to go back and try again.  I haven't felt any different yet but I'm only taking 1/2 tsp 2 times a day. Maybe I should up it to 1 tsp.? It seems like you company is making a great effort to be helpful and I look forward to trying other items in the future.

title: Great product

text: Product was delivered in a timely manner.  It was well sealed and appears to be pure and of good quality.  I would give 5 stars, but I’ve only recently begun to use the product so I can’t give a definite answer on whether it’s effective or not.  Also this is my first order, without an established track record of consistency, I can’t give 5 stars.

This time I chose the Pine Pollen tincture and Tongkat Ali powder to compliment the Pine Pollen. Also I went ahead and added a bottle of Thor’s Hammer. At this point (around 10 days in) I still can’t say I see any difference.

title: I live in Northern Victoria

title: Shopping and checkout was a breeze
text: Shopping and checkout was a breeze. The products arrived 2 days ahead of schedule.  I deducted a star because none of the links in their marketing emails work, despite trying multiple browsers, the most important of the broken links is the one to limit the amount of spam email.

title: Simple
text: Very easy interface and checkout process

title: I find the herbs to be of a very good…
text: I find the herbs to be of a very good quality. I know the customer service situation has been tough during this period of dealing with the whole covid issue. But I generally do receive very good customer service, if and when I have an issue. The website can be somewhat tricky, at least for someone my age. Because I have not seen a "continue shopping" option. I have to use the refresh, or go back button, to get back to the previous page. The check out process, is something that I have not had much trouble with. Overall, I would say I am very pleased with your company.

title: Hopes Up
text: I have read about pine pollen pretty much and I did try your capsules before but for some reason didn't feel anything and I'm a healthy person besides been overweight, this time I went for da powder and any powder is a huge mess every time and not liking it, went for da price and so far don't really know if im feeling any effects, was gonna order and try other companies on pine pollen that I know about but really grab this special and hoping that it would do what it saids, I'll wait and see!!

title: Awesome website
text: Awesome website, products, and information. Unfortunately they run out of a lot of things. Almost everything I wanted to order was out of stock. I get it, they are herbs and the process for creating the tinctures and powders is complicated. I am willing to wait and reorder! I wish there were more combinations. As a man in my very late 40's, I don't have the inclination to take 3 or 4 different powders or supplements a day. perhaps custom blends? I love what they have though and will continue to support them.

title: Love LEH's
text: Always have what I need,  and always great products. Just wish they'd use ups instead of usps for shipping, usps had a hard time honoring delivery dates nowadays.  Otherwise the company itself is great in my opinion. They help keep my health in check.

title: Your site is somewhat difficult to…

And getting back to the herbs, after you have put one in your cart, seems a bit strange. It takes two clicks on the back button, to get back to the page.

I Believe it turned my hair blacker I had grey hairs growing after 6 weeks my wife asked me how did I get out the grey... I showed her the black ant. title: Lost empire herbs has been great
text: Lost empire herbs has been great.  As with any supplementation program you must find what works for you.   Lost empire herbs is fairly informative.  I love the natural for the herbs come in although if it’s no a tincture I end up spilling a lot out of the bags.  That’s on me!  Great job keep up the good work and don’t sell out!Mike

title: Quality products that really work
text: Quality products, reliable, clean-sourced natural products. Functional, powerful formulas and single herbs that do what they promise. Delivery and packaging are first-rate, even with all the pandemic challenges we face. If you can afford them, they are the best you can get. That's about the only con to them. But what you do get is top-notch products, research, and education.

title: Strange times indeed
text: This rating is only based on the current social climate(i.e.-pandemic). It has been harder than normal to get a hold of a person to check the status of an order. And I do understand the delivery issues. Normally, I receive great customer service. Overall, I truly enjoy doing business with your company.

title: As with all supplements
text: As with all supplements, Savvy consumers do as much research as they can regarding a particular supplement  and then hope and pray  that what they are buying is actually  the product being sold. I do think though that Lost Empire herbs does the best job at being transparent with their independent laboratory studies testing for heavy metals and other such contaminants. I applaud them for their effort to give the customer Clarity and confidence in their choice to purchase products from Lost Empire herbs.

title: Quick and painless ordering
text: I love getting email notifications of upcoming sales and product updates from you all. The ordering was quick and painless, and the delivery was satisfactory. I've ordered from you all for a couple of years now and this order experience will not cause me to stop.

title: Lost Empire Herbs has an awesome…

I would recommend their site and herbs to any friend of mine. title: I find the pill form of pine pollen…

title: Really like the products and integrity…

title: Good overall experience
text: Good overall experience. Lost Empire Herbs is a Godsend; previously I was using a company I found on Amazon (who's name I can't remember because it's been so long), but they no longer make the product that was very helpful to me.  I stumbled upon LEH late one night and decided to give them a try. Their pre-sales reply-speed is quite good.  Once I purchased however, it was slower - HOWEVER, that is not to say it was bad, I just noticed it was noticeably slower; perhaps these are different departments or it could be the issue I was having as a customer needed more time to resolve.  My issue was resolved and I was very happy.  The experience of LEH is pleasant, informative and empowering.  I would recommend LEH in a heartbeat to anyone.

title: Orders process quickly and they keep…
text: Orders process quickly and they keep you posted on the status of your order. But the shipping is brutal. It was too long even before Covid. Takes 3-4 weeks to get to you. I admit that recently my pine pollen tincture arrived sooner than the powder, so it’s not all bad. A year or two ago i ordered a product and it took so long to arrive i wrote to the customer service about it. Their answer :  « Thanks for the heads up Alain ». Got the point?Not a bad company by any means, mind you, and the product is in good condition when it does arrive...  but they don’t put huge efforts on the shipping part of the deal and that bugs me a little.Good enough company and i will order again. Good product, good packaging. Just know that you have to brace yourself for some awaiting :)Alain

Take good care of yourself, exercise, eat right and let nature provide help

title: Constructive criticism
text: Good company and decent stuff. Although some of them the serving size dosis is not strong enough to feel all the beneficial. E.g. tongkat ali even though I take three doses at the same time I don´t feel  that boosts my testo. This herb once the bag opened after a few days becomes the powder lumpsy (I completely sealed after using and put it in a dry place). I don´t know if the concentration of your herbs are not as high as I wish. Well in any case, as I told at the beginning a good company and decent stuff!

title: Always having energy makes it hard to…
text: Always having energy makes it hard to determine what effects the different herbs are having on me . I know i feel better and have lost at least 10 pounds of fat around my stomach which is hard to do when you are 58 .  Cycling pine pollen and doing he shou wu everyday along with maca and will give updates to see it my grey hair starts turning dark again , Satisfied with my purchases so far and my girlfriend says that the Athena formula gives her energy !!!

title: My experience
text: I am a 61 year old male in good health but wanted a little help with energy and libido so last year I tried the Tongkat Ali and pine pollen tincture. It was helping some but not as good as I had hoped, but oddly when I ran out and quite taking it then my energy  and libido went through the roof and lasted about 3 months. So here I am again taking it for about 3 weeks now and again it is ok but not great, hoping it will do like last year and really kick in when finished. Can you give me an explanation of why this worked for me in this way?
